section.title: Overview
section.description: The Refresh Passive Link Table(s) action displays the causes Alpha Anywhere to erase the contents of the table, then retrieve the table's data from its SQL data source.

step.description: In the Refresh list select either:
Optionally, clear Run silently to have Alpha Anywhere warn you before refreshing a table.
If you chose "Selected Passive Link Tables" in step 1, place checks next to the names of the tables you want to refresh.
Optionally modify the default comment which describes the action.
